column6: THE CLONE SAGA PART 4 A double-sized 100th issue celebration! Chock full of secrets that date back to the book's beginning-finally revealed! And there are three-count 'em three-mind-staggering shock endings.
column8: | penciller (cover):Mark Bagley | writer:Brian Michael Bendis | inker:John Dell | letterer:Cory Petit | colorist:Justin Ponsor
